ygData.subject: Levels for banded
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just hit 102 in smithing last night, and I still have a pretty high failure rate for some pieces of banded (especially cloaks - I m 0 for 20 with
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
I just hit 102 in smithing last night, and I still have a pretty high
failure rate for some pieces of banded (especially cloaks - I'm 0 for 20
with those for some reason). Does anyone know the levels at which the
various banded pieces become trivial (and thus their difficulty)?

I know that bracers are trivial for me, and gorgets probably are too, but
what about the rest?

Thanks

--

"Would you tell me, please, which way I ought to go from here?"

"That depends a good deal on where you want to get to," said the Cat
-- Lewis Carrol
